metadata.title: CVE-2023-48733 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An insecure default to allow UEFI Shell in EDK2 was left enabled in Ubuntu'sEDK2. This allows an OS-resident attacker to bypass Secure Boot.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-48733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
efi-shell-arm - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
efi-shell-ia32 - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
efi-shell-x64 - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
ovmf - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
ovmf-ia32 - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
qemu-efi-arm - 2023.05-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2023.05-2ubuntu0.1').
